attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
our armed forcies march through luton
and get abuse thrown at them by muslims
this petition is for the goverment to stop these people from gathering in the streets in my country.and shouting abuse.

rejection.details:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Parades/

Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
